title: Warhammer_40000_Rites_of_War-FLT
description:
Released: July 23, 1999
Developer: DreamForge Intertainment, Inc.
Publisher: Strategic Simulations, Inc.
Genre: Turn-based strategy


Rites of War is the third of SSIs games set in the Warhammer 40,000 gaming universe from Games Workshop. The player 
takes control of the mighty Eldar to drive the humans from the Maiden World and reclaim the Eldars long lost artifacts.

Rites of War is a turn-based strategy game that uses the system from SSIs Panzer General II.



Instructions:
1) Burn/Mount ISO
2) Install
3) Play!

Optional:  There is no copy protection on disc so will play without a crack/emaulation etc, However if you want to play 
without disc there is a NoCD patch in the "Crack" directory on disc.  Either copy to install directory or direct patch 
to the correct exe file.
